title: Surrounded Islands, Project for Biscayne Bay, Greater Miami, Florida
medium: graphite, charcoal, pastel, wax crayon, enamel paint, aerial photograph by Wolfgang Volz, and fabric sample, on two sheets of paper in two parts
dimensions:
sheet (left panel): 164.2 x 106.2 cm (64 5/8 x 41 13/16 in.)
sheet (right panel): 164.7 x 37.9 cm (64 13/16 x 14 15/16 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 165.1 x 147.3 cm (65 x 58 in.)
creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
